title: Confrontations
description: Some of the hotel's guests who are part of a convention, are treating some of the guests in a strange manner. It's later revealed that they are bigots. Mrs. Cabot decides to treat them as guests. And a woman with a mentally challenged daughter is concerned when her daughter is drawn to a mime.

title: Lifelines
description: A young mother comes to the hotel to bring her baby to the couple who want to adopt her baby. But some of the staff upon learning that the baby's father doesn't know about the baby tries to find him before it's too late. And a woman executive is approached by a man from her past who is threatening to reveal a secret unless he helps her with something.

title: Intimate Strangers
description: An actress (Taylor) who hasn't done anything in sometime comes to town to appear in a play. A guest runs into her husband, the hotel's electrician who ran out on her seven years ago. And McDermott has a temporary secretary who can't help but try and run his life.

title: Fantasies
description: An old boyfriend of Christine's comes to town and is willing to do anything to win her over including buying the hotel. And a couple who are friends of Peter's may not be happy as they appear to be.

title: Vantage Point
description: A playboy who still relies on his mother to support him is told by her that she's arranged a date for him with a girl she wants him to court. But when he sees her assistant whom he mistakes for her, he asks one of the hotel's bellboys to go in his place and he and the girl hit it off. Peter has a reunion with two of his friends and some old unresolved matters and secrets are revealed.

title: Ideals
description: When the daughter of the hotel's guests gets sick, Christine tries to get her medical assistance but her parents refuse treatment cause it's against their beliefs. Christine tries to convince them to reconsider. Mark has been seeing an older woman and asks her to marry him. But her son's disapproval and a career opportunity might keep her from accepting. And Mrs. Cabot tries to get a painting she did in art show but the man in charge doesn't think it's good.

title: Final Chapters
description: A man who's about to get married has his bachelor party in the hotel. And upon the exotic dancer hired for the entertainment he finds himself wondering about why is he getting married. Mrs. Cabot's nephew is attracted to Christine. And Billy's father whom he's been estranged from comes looking to connect with him but he rejects him. Until he finds out something his father is not telling him.

title: Promises
description: Lynn, a woman who once worked at the hotel, returns with her husband, Eduardo, an Italian. They stay at the honeymoon suite but their marriage is not exactly what people think it is. A woman paid Lynn to marry Eduardo so that he could enter the country and be the woman's lover. A man whom Christine knows shows up and connects with Mrs. Cabot. Later Christine learns that the man has been scamming women for money. And an actor whom Dave knows, has a role of a hotel manager in a play and asks Peter is he could study him. And eventually he annoys Peter.

title: Love and Honor
description: A girl looking to meet someone hooks up with a British official. While together the man makes her take some heroin and she dies. He claims he wasn't with her and because of his diplomatic immunity can't be touched. But Billy decides to investigate. A girl who came to town to take possession of an inheritance meets a guy who unknown to her has been her benefactor for years. And two guys compete to see who can land Julie. When she learns of this she decides to get back at them.

title: Anniversary
description: A couple who got married at the hotel 35 years ago have returned to celebrate their anniversary. But things are not as pleasant--the husband has devoted himself to his work that his wife is having an affair. And also their son, who's seeing Christine, is like his father--putting his work before his daughter. And their daughter who's had several relationships and marriages comes and makes a spectacle of herself but Peter helps her. And she's also keeping a secret that she now reveals that sends her father over the edge.

title: Sleeping Dogs
description: A friend of Billy's who use to be an FBI agent learns the woman he's been dating is the widow of someone he killed while an agent. And when one of Christine's friends is engaged she and a couple of other friends get together but secrets that some are keeping threaten their friendship.

title: Passports
description: A Russian who immigrated to the U.S. wants to return to Russia. His wife is willing to accompany him but his son doesn't want to. And a singer who's seeing Julie runs into his former partner.

title: Missing Pieces
description: Christine is dating a guy who seems too good to be true but what she doesn't know is that he has psychological problems. A couple of guests who are married to other people but are not with them get together. And an aging bellman has been making a lot of mistakes, so his future is in question.

title: Echoes
description: A young man goes to see Mrs. Cabot and claims that her husband is his father. She accepts without question. But Peter is suspicious. A woman who is dating an older man with grown children, asks him if he's open to having more children he says no. She then says she's pregnant but he says he had a vasectomy so it means her ex is the father.

title: Celebrations
description: For the hotel's anniversary, Mrs. Cabot's father in law comes for the festivities but is not content to be retired. The hotel's aerobics instructor, who wants to land a wealthy husband, checks into the hotel.And she meets a guy whom she thinks is just a delivery man. And one of the maids who is pregnant, is being chased by immigration, so Christine hides her.

title: Queen's Gambit
description: A woman plots to kill her husband and pulls Billy into her plot. Peter continues his battle with Charles for control of the hotel.

title: Double Jeopardy
description: A man is staying at the hotel with his wife. Later a woman comes looking for him and claims to be his wife. Another guest recognizes Billy and tells her husband who is a Sheriff from where he comes from. He then has Billy arrested for murder.

title: Forsaking All Others
description: When someone offers to buy the hotel, Peter refuses to entertain it while Charles says it should be considered. Charles meets someone he knew, who left him because she didn't want to compete with his love for business. A man whose wife works at the hotel, claims she's mentally ill while she claims her husband is possessive and she left him. He will do whatever he has to get her back.

title: Restless Nights
description: Two women come to the hotel so that one of them can get back at her husband for cheating on her by hooking up with someone. A couple who recently lost her daughter, stay at the hotel so that she could get away from reminders of her child. When she bumps into a couple with baby, she thinks that their baby is hers so she takes her. Christine finds her and tries to talk to her.

title: Unfinished Business
description: Peter's ex wife shows up, looking for a job. Peter gets her an interview but she is told the results of her physical, that she has a terminal disease and doesn't know how to handle it. And one of the hotel's employees, has managed to keep his illiteracy a secret but when he's offered a promotion and his estranged son comes and asks for his help; causes problems for him in every front.

title: Fatal Attraction
description: Peter tries to help his wife as she's dying. Dave learns that his old fraternity is holding their initiation at the hotel. And he reminds them that hazing is prohibited. But during the initiation one of them decides to haze someone and he ends up in the hospital. Dave learns of it and tries to convince the guy to say what happened. Dave goes to the head of fraternity but he's the father of the one who did the hazing.

title: Reservations
description: Assistant general manager Christine befriends a retired airline pilot, so Peter, the general manager of the hotel, becomes jealous and starts spending time with Leslie, a socialite who's secretly using his hotel to run a prostitution ring.

title: Prized Possessions
description: One of the hotel's guests reports that she's been robbed. She wants one very important piece be returned or else she will make sure that the hotel will suffer. Later an investigator reveals that one of the guests is a suspected thief and it seems that he made a move on Christine which the investigator wishes to exploit. And another guest, an old man who is with his grandson, is wanted for kidnapping the boy from his mother.

title: Power Play
description: Charles Cabot sends word to Peter that he is coming. When he arrives, he tells Peter that he's in town to sell his share in the hotel cause he's in the red. And he wants Peter to sell his share too. Peter doesn't like the buyer. He then decides to buy Charles' share. Two newlywed couples share a suite. And somehow the spouses make connections with the other.
